filmography.title: Oklahoma!
filmography.role_description: A wholesome farm girl who is courted by a handsome cowboy in this classic Rodgers and Hammerstein musical.
filmography.plot: In the Oklahoma territory, a farm girl is courted by a cowboy and a menacing farmhand.

filmography.title: Carousel
filmography.role_description: A sweet millworker who falls in love with a troubled carnival barker, leading to a tragic romance.
filmography.plot: A carnival barker returns from Heaven to visit his wife and daughter on Earth.

filmography.title: April Love
filmography.role_description: A farm girl who helps reform a young city delinquent sent to live in the country.
filmography.plot: A young man is sent to his uncle's farm for rehabilitation and falls for a neighbor girl.

filmography.title: Never Steal Anything Small
filmography.role_description: The wife of a lawyer who catches the eye of a corrupt but charming union boss.
filmography.plot: A crooked waterfront labor leader decides to run for union president, using every dirty trick in the book to win.

filmography.title: Bobbikins
filmography.role_description: The wife of a struggling British entertainer whose infant son begins to talk like an adult stockbroker.
filmography.plot: A baby talks like a corporate executive and gives stock tips to his father.

filmography.title: Elmer Gantry
filmography.role_description: A vengeful prostitute and former lover of the title character who exposes his hypocrisy; a radical departure from her wholesome image.
filmography.plot: A fast-talking traveling salesman joins a female evangelist's road show and becomes a powerful religious figure.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actress; National Board of Review: Win – Best Supporting Actress

filmography.title: Pepe
filmography.role_description: A waitress in Hollywood who becomes the love interest of the titular character in this star-studded musical.
filmography.plot: A Mexican ranch hand travels to Hollywood to retrieve his beloved horse, encountering numerous celebrities along the way.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Motion Picture (Musical/Comedy)

filmography.title: Two Rode Together
filmography.role_description: A woman desperate to find her brother who was abducted by Comanches years earlier.
filmography.plot: A corrupt marshal and an army officer travel into Comanche territory to rescue white captives.

filmography.title: The Music Man
filmography.role_description: A skeptical small-town librarian and piano teacher who falls for a con-man posing as a band leader.
filmography.plot: A traveling con artist arrives in an Iowa town to sell band instruments and uniforms, but his plans are complicated when he falls for the librarian.

filmography.title: The Courtship of Eddie's Father
filmography.role_description: A sensible neighbor and divorcee who becomes a potential love interest for a widower.
filmography.plot: A widower's son plays matchmaker for his father, trying to find the perfect new mother.

filmography.title: A Ticklish Affair
filmography.role_description: A widow with three children who catches the eye of a Navy Commander when her kids send SOS signals from her house.
filmography.plot: A Navy Commander investigates distress signals from a house, leading him to a widow and her three sons.

filmography.title: Dark Purpose
filmography.role_description: An art appraiser who travels to Italy and becomes entangled with a mysterious villa owner.
filmography.plot: An American art appraiser in Italy finds herself in danger when she becomes involved with a wealthy man and his secret past.

filmography.title: Bedtime Story
filmography.role_description: An American heiress targeted by two con men on the French Riviera who compete to swindle her.
filmography.plot: Two con men, one elegant and one crude, compete to swindle an American soap heiress.

filmography.title: Fluffy
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a hotel owner who helps a scientist hiding a tame lion in his room.
filmography.plot: A professor attempts to prove that a lion can be trained as a domestic pet, causing chaos in a hotel.

filmography.title: The Secret of My Success
filmography.role_description: A woman who gets involved with a bumbling police officer who is secretly wealthy.
filmography.plot: A bumbling police officer tries to hide his wealth while solving crimes and romancing women.

filmography.title: The Happy Ending
filmography.role_description: A supportive friend to a disillusioned housewife who is struggling with an unhappy marriage.
filmography.plot: A bored housewife runs away from her husband to find herself, reflecting on her life and choices.

filmography.title: The Cheyenne Social Club
filmography.role_description: The madam of a brothel that is inherited by James Stewart's character, leading to a clash of morals.
filmography.plot: An aging cowboy inherits a brothel and decides to turn it into a respectable boarding house, much to the dismay of the residents.

filmography.title: Beyond the Poseidon Adventure
filmography.role_description: The ship's nurse who aids survivors and scavengers aboard the capsized ocean liner.
filmography.plot: Two rival salvage parties enter the capsized Poseidon to look for money, gold, and plutonium, finding more survivors.

filmography.title: Tank
filmography.role_description: The wife of a Sergeant Major who supports him when he uses his own tank to rescue their son from a corrupt sheriff.
filmography.plot: A Sergeant Major takes his personal Sherman tank on a rampage to rescue his son from a corrupt sheriff's prison.

filmography.title: There Were Times, Dear
filmography.role_description: A devoted wife struggling to care for her husband as he succumbs to early-onset Alzheimer's disease.
filmography.plot: A moving drama about a family coping with the father's diagnosis of Alzheimer's disease.

filmography.title: Gideon
filmography.role_description: A resident of a retirement home who finds her life touched by a mysterious new resident.
filmography.plot: A simple-minded man moves into a retirement home and positively affects the lives of the elderly residents.

filmography.title: Manna from Heaven
filmography.role_description: A quirky matriarch who tries to gather her family to repay a 'loan' from God they received years earlier.
filmography.plot: A neighborhood is gifted a windfall of cash, but years later, one resident insists they must pay it back.

filmography.title: Grandma's Boy
filmography.role_description: A sexually adventurous grandmother who becomes an unlikely friend to a video game tester.
filmography.plot: A 35-year-old video game tester is forced to move in with his grandmother and her two elderly friends.

filmography.title: Hidden Places
filmography.role_description: The eccentric, bible-quoting aunt of a woman trying to save her family farm during the Great Depression.
filmography.plot: A widow struggles to keep her orange grove during the Great Depression with the help of a drifter.

filmography.title: Family Weekend
filmography.role_description: The feisty grandmother of a teenager who takes her parents hostage to force them to pay attention to her.
filmography.plot: A teenage girl takes her parents hostage after they miss her jump roping competition.
